title: Monday Pt1: Packers over Bears, Giants 2-0, Tagovailoa Respect, Bengals 0-2, Cowboys and Cardinals Surprises
itunes:title: Monday Pt1: Packers over Bears, Giants 2-0, Tagovailoa Respect, Bengals 0-2, Cowboys and Cardinals Surprises
description:
Part One of the Good Morning Football Podcast begins with the Packers win over the Bears. Hosts Jamie Erdahl, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Super Bowl Champion Jason McCourty marvel at the Giants being able to find a way to win again and start the season 2-0. The Dolphins are getting respect after a comeback win over the Ravens.  We debate if the Cowboys win was more surprising than the Bengals 0-2 start.  Plus, Kyler Murray was electric, but can this formula win all season long?  Stay tuned for Jimmy G and Monday Night Football Previews coming in Part Two!

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

The Dolphins are getting respect after a comeback win over the Ravens.  We debate if the Cowboys win was more surprising than the Bengals 0-2 start.  Plus, Kyler Murray was electric, but can this formula win all season long?  Stay tuned for Jimmy G and Monday Night Football Previews coming in Part Two!
